page.title: 02MY LEISURE TIME (II)
page.content: I don't go to any clubs,because there aren't any in my area.Even if there were clubs in my area I don't think I would go to them.I play records at home,but most of the records belong to my sister.I play these records when I am doing my homework or just when I'm bored.I don't have a job.The only jobs I do are going to the shops for people or helping them with their housework. Jobs are like paper rounds etc. which you get paid for,so you can't really call housework a job.My favourite sport is swimming.I go swimming about twice a month.My best swimming stroke is back- stroke.I enjoy swimming,and I go to the Kingsway Baths.I prefer to go to the Leisure Centre at Morecambe,because it is much nicer and it is an open-air pool. Rachel Edgar Castle School,Lancaster.
